product_name: Merrell Moab Ventilator Lace-Up Shoes - Kids' - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Built for hiking and outdoor adventures on warm summer days, the exceptionally breathable kids' Merrell Moab Ventilator Lace-Up shoes provide top-notch comfort to your mountaineer-in-training. Suede leather and nylon mesh uppers offer ample breathability, flexibility and support for long-lasting performance. Protective toe bumpers ensure durability and abrasion resistance. Mesh padded tongues protect insteps against lace pressure without inhibiting breathability. Nylon mesh linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for comfort in hot conditions. EVA midsoles with Air Cushion heel pockets absorb shock; removable, perforated footbeds add cushioning for improved comfort. Merrell Pulse rubber outsoles feature a tread design inspired by mountain bike tires to deliver reliable traction on wet and dry surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Built for hiking and outdoor adventures on warm summer days, the exceptionally breathable kids' Merrell Moab Ventilator Lace-Up shoes provide top-notch comfort to your mountaineer-in-training.
